summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 8, University View Addition, being the alley between 31st Avenue Northeast and 33rd Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 57th Street; and certain other alleys and streets, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14869 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
